const module¶

class const.Const¶

Bases: object

Define a constant class to implement the constant function

Define the __setattr()__function and an exception ConstErr class, ConstErro class inherits TypeError class. Use self’s __dict__ to check the constant. If the constant exists, throw rebind exception, or create the it. And register this Const class to the sys.modules dictionary.

Ver 1.0

exception ConstError¶

Bases: TypeError
